players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. I acted alone last night."
You: "Thanks Diana, will do. Stay safe."
Charlie: "Diana warned me to watch Bob. Be cautious, Diana is a mafia."
Charlie: "I'll watch both Bob and Diana closely. Charlie"
You: "Will keep everyone in mind, thanks for the tips."
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on both. Diana might lie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. I acted alone last night."
Bob: "Thanks Diana, will do. Stay safe."
You: "Diana warned me to watch Bob. Be cautious, Diana is a mafia."
You: "I'll watch both Bob and Diana closely. Charlie"
Bob: "Will keep everyone in mind, thanks for the tips."
Diana: "Charlie, keep an eye on both. Diana might lie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. I acted alone last night."
Bob: "Thanks Diana, will do. Stay safe."
Charlie: "Diana warned me to watch Bob. Be cautious, Diana is a mafia."
Charlie: "I'll watch both Bob and Diana closely. Charlie"
Bob: "Will keep everyone in mind, thanks for the tips."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on both. Diana might lie."
